about_the_game:
The universe's depths hide multitudes of tantalising secrets. At least, the universe of Furry from Outer Space! For lovers of sci-fi and space operas who ever thought about all the unknown kinks spread around the universe, or what it's like to find yourself in a passionate embrace of alien creatures. You're invited on the most spectacular erotic journey!



Where will you go? A factory producing robots with some very intriguing hidden functionality? Looking for spicy secrets of a long lost civilisation? Making first contact with dwellers of other planets? (And the second, and the third...) Or maybe you prefer the strong tentacles of a creature sharing a ship with you?



In these series you can pick a character who suits you more ❤️
What would you prefer?
A hot classic? 🍆🍑
Steamy manly embraces? 🍆🍆
Tender feminine care? 🍑🍑
Our all at once? 👀
This time we intend to satisfy every request! ❤️

Whatever you choose — welcome to the amorous cosmos of Furry from Outer Space!



Features:
• Several sci-fi stories where you can choose your character’s gender!
• Original illustrations
• Longer animated sex scenes with sound effects and voiceover
• Branching narrative, hard choices, sloppy rewards
• Updated Match-3 gameplay with new goals and features

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features nude male and female furry characters, explicit graphic sex scenes between them, BDSM, public sex and scenes featuring alcohol and intoxication.
All characters in the stories are of legal age and give their consent to everything that happens.

detailed_description:

name: Furry from Outer Space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: ✨Come on an interstellar trip with Furry from Outer Space — into space, love and steamy sex! ✨ Choose your character’s gender, explore faraway worlds and different story branches while enjoying fully voiced animations! ✨
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
